title: Panoramic 3 Bedroom Hillside Sea View Pool Villa in Maenam
description:
Key Features
•	3 bedroom, 3 bathroom villa perched on hillside
•	Infinity-edge private pool overlooking the sea
•	Open-plan living and dining with panoramic glass walls
•	Fully equipped gourmet kitchen
•	Air-conditioned bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms
•	Floor area: 450 sqm
•	Land area: 700 sqm
•	Season: November to April
